content.question: In the last line of the poem, the use of the word “Here” mainly serves to

choices.label: create a sense of immediacy for the reader
indicate the speaker’s offer of a gift to an unnamed addressee
reinforce the speaker’s attempt to recapture a memory

content.answer: create a sense of immediacy for the reader

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe the narrator or speaker of a text.
